name: Clayers
description:
U have one goal - survive!

Defense yourself against waves of enemies. ?Attack them by using colored bullets?

All mobs are vulnerable to their own color. 

Player can carry only to colors ones. U can combine to colors in storage to create new color!  To refill color-container use enemy bodies. 

Controls:

Cursor keys/WASD - move

LMB - fire

Q - select first color

E - select second color

Space - combine colors

"1" - pick up color from the ground

"2" - pick up color from the ground
